name: NIGHTMARE (itch) (mcarrera)
description:
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

- NIGHTMARE -

Are you afraid of the nightmares? Have you ever had that one, when the walls enclose arround you? 

Fear not, and try to get the best score!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

- OBJECTIVE -

The objective is simple, don't get squashed by the walls. 
Collect all the green bubble monsters, this will keep the walls away. The more monster bubbles you take, the more you will have.

Try not to miss the green bubble monsters, they will get lost forever in your dreams if not collected in 3 seconds.

Take care with the red ones! This little bastards will move the walls towards you, the longer you stay alive the harder they will hit!

Unlocking the secret skin is only for hardcore people, but I encorage you to try it. Tell me if you manage to do it! (Also because I want to make sure it is dificult enough)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
